TopicTitle: Is Jool gonna have better effects?

Articles.Content: In Ksp 1 we have Jool, and the storms effects, that was released on 1.10, but will we get better effects when descending trough Jool's atmosphere? Because even after 1.10 when descending Jool, it stills pretty empty of clouds or these kind of stuff you would see if you were descending in a Gas Giant.
Perhaps it'll be added along with KSP2's clouds. If so it would look seriously wicked. and if we don't get that, then it's not a downgrade from what we already have, and so we can accept that too.
The cinematic trailer seems to imply that yes, there will be proper storm systems and clouds visible from orbit, though we haven't seen any gameplay footage of Jool yet too my knowledge.

Thank me later for reference

They are both very different. So you know...
